item.title: Definition
item.author: hello@growdigital.org (Jake Rayson)
item.description: A forest garden mimics the edge of woodland and works with nature to grow produce sustainably for less work.

item.title: What is a Forest Garden?
item.author: hello@growdigital.org (Jake Rayson)
item.description: With a forest garden, you can grow food sustainably for less work and more wildlife.
